alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Richland and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 709 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Forest Acres, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, McEntire Air Base, Dentsville, Arcadia Lakes, Hopkins, Villages at Sandhill, Horrel Hill, Killian, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Fort Jackson, Five Points, Fort Jackson Wildcat Road, Cayce Riverwalk and Olympia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 near mile marker 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 68 and 86. Interstate 77 between mile markers 3 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
